document.masterDocTitle: A history of the sub-order Cystonectae (Hydrozoa: Siphonophorae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A history of the sub-order Cystonectae (Hydrozoa: Siphonophorae)

mods:name.mods:affiliation: National Oceanography Centre, Empress Dock, Southampton, SO 14 3 ZH

; 1776, Pl. 33, fig. F; Modeer, 1789, p. 282; Gmelin, 1790, p. 3159; Lamarck,
5–10; Keferstein & Ehlers, 1861, p. 32, Pl. II, fig. 18–25; L. Agassiz, 1862, p. 370; Vogt, 1862a,b fig.3; Claus, 1863, Pl. 47,

170; Lo Bianco, 1899, p. 463 Richter, 1907, p. 559, text-figs. 1-6, Pl. 27, figs. 1-13; Kawamura, 1910a, p. 447, Pl. XIV, fig.
p. 427; Leloup, 1955a, p. 17; Bigelow & Sears, 1937, p. 65, fig. 50; Totton, 1965, p. 41, Pl. I, fig. 2, Pl. II-IV; Patriti, 1970,

& Wagner, 2006, p. 747, figs. 2, 7; Araujo, 2012, p.58.
